backend/main.mo: Main actor defining groomer registration and service management with methods to register groomers, update services, and query groomer data, storing groomers in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that handles canister upgrades by preserving groomer data and initializing nextGroomerId from the existing groomers map size.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for groomer onboarding including routing, registration form, service management, Chewy blue styling, and React Query backend integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing the scheduler page, groomer onboarding flow, hooks for backend integration, styling with Chewy blue theme, and sample data fallbacks.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including standard UI tokens for background, foreground, borders, and semantic colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with two routes (scheduler at / and groomer onboarding at /groomer-onboard) and rendering Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Groom: Controlled form component collecting groomer profile data (name, email, phone, business name) with Chewy blue focus states and required field indicators.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Servi: Service management component allowing add, edit, and delete operations for service entries with inline editing, validation, and Chewy blue styled buttons.
frontend/src/components/scheduler/BookNo: Modal dialog component for booking grooming appointments that displays service details, allows date selection, and handles appointment confirmation with validation.
frontend/src/components/scheduler/Groome: Displays a grid of groomer cards with photos, ratings, descriptions, and service counts, handling loading states, errors, and click-to-select interactions.
frontend/src/components/scheduler/Servic: Lists grooming services with details, pricing, and booking buttons; integrates BookNowModal and shows toast notifications on successful appointment scheduling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGroomers.ts: React Query hook that fetches all groomers from backend, enriches them with photos and descriptions, and gracefully falls back to sample data on errors or empty results.
frontend/src/hooks/useGroomerServices.ts: React Query hook that fetches services for a specific groomer, falling back to sample data for groomers with IDs 1-3.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegisterGroomer.ts: React Query mutation hook for registering a new groomer with name and services, invalidating the groomers query cache on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system including light/dark themes, color tokens (primary, secondary, destructive, etc.), and a custom 'chewy' brand color scheme using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/groomerDescriptionCatal: Provides descriptive text for groomers by ID with predefined descriptions for groomers 1-4 and deterministic fallback descriptions for any other groomer IDs.
frontend/src/lib/groomerPhotoCatalog.ts: Maps groomer IDs to local pet photo assets (640x360 JPGs) with alt text, providing a lookup function to retrieve photos for display.
frontend/src/lib/sampleGroomers.ts: Defines sample groomer data with three groomers (Happy Paws, Furry Friends Spa, Pampered Pets) each containing multiple services with titles, descriptions, and price ranges for initial app state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/GroomerOnboardPage.ts: Multi-step groomer registration page with form for business details and service management, handling submission via useRegisterGroomer hook and displaying success state with navigation options.
Main scheduler page displaying groomer selection list and service details, with fallback handling for backend errors, navigation to onboarding, and two-step UI flow (select groomer, then view services).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom color system using OKLCH values, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking a pet groomer scheduler application with Chewy-inspired UI, including groomer selection, service booking, and onboarding flows. Currently at version 17 with known issues around Chewy blue styling not applying correctly and groomer list failing to load.
